articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Heathrow says it has become the biggest airport to drop the limit after rolling out new high-tech scanners.
articles.title: Heathrow scraps 100ml liquid container limit

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A BBC investigation uncovers how criminals are operating huge illegal rubbish tips across the country.
articles.title: Supersized illegal waste dumps hidden across English countryside

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Former London ICC members tell the BBC they were pushed into making donations they could not afford.
articles.title: Young people say they felt pressured by emerging church to donate

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Trump did not provide a reason for the decision, which comes after Canada's PM Mark Carney warned of a "rupture" in the US-led global order.
articles.title: Trump withdraws Canada's invite to join Board of Peace

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The US president said allied troops had "stayed a little back" during the war in Afghanistan.
articles.title: Trump sparks anger with claim Nato troops avoided Afghanistan front line

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: An internal investigation found there was a case to answer over several incidents raised by former BBC Radio Cornwall presenter Jack Murley.
articles.title: BBC apologises to sacked ex-presenter over homophobic abuse

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The national memorial to the late Queen Elizabeth in St James's Park will not show her riding a horse as previously illustrated.
articles.title: Queen Elizabeth II statue will be standing and not on horseback

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Some of Sir Keir Starmer's allies say they will try to stop Burnham from standing in a by-election.
articles.title: Andy Burnham faces decision on bid to return as MP

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: More developments in Davos and the PM's allies moving to stop a potential leadership bid feature on Friday's front pages.
articles.title: Newspaper headlines: Zelensky's 'fiery' Davos speech and 'Operation Stop Burnham'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Concealing symptoms of menopause can have knock-on effects for some women, such as increasing the risk of burnout
articles.title: Why 'menopause masking' can have consequences - as I discovered
